import React, { Component } from 'react' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button' import Modal from '../popups/modal' import CameraItem from './cameraItem' import AddCameraModal from './addCameraModal' const Axios = require('axios') class configurationBoard extends Component { state = { triggerAddCameraModal: false, showCameraModal: false, showContactsModal: false } componentDidMount(){ } handleCameraModal = () => { let currentCamState = this.state.showCameraModal this.setState({showCameraModal: !currentCamState}) if(currentCamState){ this.setState({triggerAddCameraModal: true}) } } handleContactModal = () => { let currentCamState = this.state.showContactsModal this.setState({showContactsModal: !currentCamState}) } render(){ return(
